basic.description: This course focuses on the techniques of acquiring a dialect for stage     performance. Scene study and monologues performed in dialects. Content may vary from semester to semester. May be repeated to a maximum of six semester hours.
basic.subject: TPP
basic.title: Dialects for Stage

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: TPP 2110r, TPP 3710r, TPP 3711, and/or instructor permission.
